  const snowCanvas = document.getElementById('snowflakesHeavy');

  const snowflakes = 250;

  w = canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
  h = canvas.height = window.innerHeight;

  function createSnowflakes() {
    for (let i = 1; i < snowflakes; i++) {
      snowArray.push({
        x: Math.random() * w,
        y: Math.random() * h,
        opacity: Math.random(),
        speedX: random(-11, 11),
        speedY: random(7, 15),
        radius: random(0.5, 4.2)
      });
    }
  }

  function drawSnowflakes() {
    for (let i = 0; i < snowflakes; i++) {
      const gradient = ctx.createRadialGradient(snowArray[i].x, snowArray[i].y, 0, snowArray[i].x, snowArray[i].y, snowArray[i].radius);
      gradient.addColorStop(0, `rgba(255,255,255,${snowArray[i].opacity})`);
      gradient.addColorStop(0, 'rgba(0,0,0,0)');

      ctx.arc(snowArray[i].x, snowArray[i].y, snowArray[i].radius, 0, Math.PI * 2, false);
      ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
      ctx.fill();
    }
  }

  function moveSnowflakes() {
    for (let i = 0; i < snowArray.length; i++) {
      snowArray[i].x = snowArray[i].speedX;
      snowArray[i].y = snowArray[i].speedY;

      if (snowArray[i].y > h) {
        snowArray[i].x = Math.random() * w * 1.5;
        snowArray[i].y = -50;
      }
    }
  }

  function updateSnowfall() {
    ctx.clearRect(0, 0, w, h);
    drawSnowflakes();
    moveSnowflakes();
  }

  setInterval(updateSnowfall, 50);
  createSnowflakes();

import React from 'react' import './HeavySnow.css' export default function HeavySnow() { function random(min, max) { return Math.random() * (max - min + 1) ; } /*const snowflakes = document.querySelectorAll('.snowflakeHeavy'); for (let i = 0; i < snowflakes.length; i++) { const snowflake = snowflakes[i] snowflake.setAttribute('cx', getRandom(1,100) + '%'); snowflake.setAttribute('cy', '-5%'); }*/ const snowCanvas = document.getElementById('snowflakesHeavy'); const ctx = snowCanvas.getContext('2d'); const snowflakes = 250; const snowArray = []; let w, h; w = canvas.width = window.innerWidth; h = canvas.height = window.innerHeight; function createSnowflakes() { for(let i = 1; i < snowflakes; i++) { snowArray.push({ x: Math.random() * w, y: Math.random() * h, opacity: Math.random(), speedX: random(-11, 11), speedY: random(7, 15), radius: random(0.5, 4.2) }) } } function drawSnowflakes() { for(let i = 0; i < snowflakes; i++) { const gradient = ctx.createRadialGradient( snowArray[i].x, snowArray[i].y, 0, snowArray[i].x, snowArray[i].y, snowArray[i].radius ); gradient.addColorStop(0, `rgba(255,255,255,${snowArray[i].opacity})`); gradient.addColorStop(0, 'rgba(0,0,0,0)'); ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc( snowArray[i].x, snowArray[i].y, snowArray[i].radius, 0, Math.PI*2, false ); ctx.fillStyle = gradient; ctx.fill(); } } function moveSnowflakes() { for (let i = 0; i < snowArray.length; i++) { snowArray[i].x = snowArray[i].speedX; snowArray[i].y = snowArray[i].speedY if (snowArray[i].y > h) { snowArray[i].x = Math.random() * w * 1.5; snowArray[i].y = -50; } } } function updateSnowfall() { ctx.clearRect(0 ,0, w, h); drawSnowflakes(); moveSnowflakes(); } setInterval(updateSnowfall, 50); createSnowflakes(); return(
) } /* */
